monsters.name: Assassin
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment)
monsters.languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

section-traits.label: Assassinate
section-traits.desc: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

section-traits.label: Evasion
section-traits.desc: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

section-traits.label: Sneak attack (1/Turn)
section-traits.desc: The assassin deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc:
+7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

section-actions.label: Light Crossbow
section-actions.desc:
+7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target.
Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

section-actions.label: Club
section-actions.desc:
+2 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Archmage
monsters.resistances: damage from spells; nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing (from stoneskin)

section-traits.label: Magic Resistance
section-traits.desc: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The archmage is an 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile
2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fly, lightning bolt
4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin*
5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force
6th level (1 slot): globe of invulnerability
7th level (1 slot): teleport
8th level (1 slot): mind blank*
9th level (1 slot): time stop

*The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+6 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful alignment

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc:
+3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Light Crossbow
section-actions.desc:
+3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target.
Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bandit Captain
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-lawful alignment

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Berserker
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any chaotic alignment

section-traits.label: Reckless
section-traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

section-actions.label: Greataxe
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Club
section-actions.desc:
+2 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Dark Devotion
section-traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

section-actions.label: Scimitar
section-actions.desc:
+3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Cult Fanatic
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Dark Devotion
section-traits.desc: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slot): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
1st level (4 slot): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

section-actions.label: Quarterstaff
section-actions.desc:
+2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target.
Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

section-traits.label: Brave
section-traits.desc: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

section-traits.label: Brute
section-traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

section-actions.label: Shield Bash
section-actions.desc: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft, one creature. Hit: (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed one a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Brave
section-traits.desc: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The knight makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Greatsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

section-actions.label: Heavy Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Leadership
section-actions.deco: (Recharges after a short or Long Rest).
section-actions.desc: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command of warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throws. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, prestidigitation
1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield
2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion
3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm
5th level (1 slot): cone of cold

section-actions.label: Dagger
section-actions.desc:
+5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.
Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Rapier
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Parry
section-reactions.desc: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

section-traits.label: Divine Eminence
section-traits.desc: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. this benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

section-traits.label: Spellcasting
section-traits.desc:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flames, thaumaturgy
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary
2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, spiritual weapon
3rd level (2 slots): dispel magic, spirit guardians

section-actions.label: Mace
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

section-traits.label: Keen Hearing and Sight
section-traits.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Longbow
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Spy
monsters.skills: Deception +5, Insight +4, Investigation +5, Perception +6, Persuasion +5, Sleight of Hand +4, Stealth +4

section-traits.label: Cunning Action
section-traits.desc: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

section-traits.label: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
section-traits.desc: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The spy makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Hand Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Thug
monsters.keywords: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

section-traits.label: Pack Tactics
section-traits.desc: The thug has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The thug makes two melee attacks.

section-actions.label: Mace
section-actions.desc: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

section-actions.label: Heavy Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

section-traits.label: Pack Tactics
section-traits.desc: The warrior has advantage on an attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

section-actions.label: Spear
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

section-actions.label: Multiattack
section-actions.desc: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

section-actions.label: Longsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Heavy Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Shifter Thief
monsters.skills: Acrobatics +7, Athletics +3, Sleight of Hand +5, Stealth +7, Perception +3

section-traits.label: Second-Story Work
section-traits.desc: Climbing costs no extra movement. In addition, the thief can jump 15ft when making a long jump.

section-traits.label: Sneak attack (1/Turn)
section-traits.desc: The assassin deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

section-traits.label: Cunning Action
section-traits.desc: On each of its turns, the thief can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

section-traits.label: Swiftstride Shifting
section-traits.desc: Once per rest as a bonus action, the shifter thief gains 5 temporary hit points and also its speed goes up to 40ft for 1 minute.

section-actions.label: Shortsword
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-actions.label: Hand Crossbow
section-actions.desc: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

section-reactions.label: Swiftstride
section-reactions.desc: When an ennemy ends its turn within 5 feet of the thief, the thief can move up to 10 feet as a reaction. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
